summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City of Seattle's solid waste system, regulating the distribution of single-use plastic and biodegradable carryout bags and requiring retail establishments to collect a pass-through charge from customers requesting recyclable paper carryout bags, and amending Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 21.36.
sponsor: O'BRIEN; CO-SPONSORS: BAGSHAW, BURGESS, CLARK, CONLIN, GODDEN, LICATA
